tweets.text:
I build an AI >> human-sounding text generator. 

Mainly just for myself to use it bc im sick of all the special characters and emdash that comes from AI. 

I spend most of 90% of my time writing original stuff, then let AI cleanup and format, but the generated tokens mean I need to do a 2nd round of cleaning which is annoying. 

Currently not opened for public usage bc its so annoying to deal with auth, token management, key management. 

I just let anyone I personally know use my SK, from the Superuser key parameter. 

Its just a shitty GPT wrapper that you can easily add a custom prompt on your original text layer anyway.

However, if at least 10 people want this thing, I could be bothered to buy a custom domain + setup all the stripe and stuff.
